revised_title: The Impact of E. W. R. Steacie on Scientific Research in Canada
tldr: This article is a biography of Edgar William Richard Steacie, a prominent Canadian scientist who significantly influenced the development of science in Canada. Steacie made important contributions to the fields of physical chemistry, chemical kinetics, and atomic reactions. He played a crucial role in expanding scientific research in Canadian universities and industry, and his efforts led to the establishment of postdoctoral fellowship schemes in the National Research Council of Canada.
